attributes.comment:
The fee for applying for an application for an international adoption is already high
enough especially for the services received. Parents already spend between
$15,000 - $25,000 to adopt an orphaned child internationally why add to the
already high cost? Isn't the point to give more of these children a home? Parents
already have burden the cost of getting refingerprinted if the number of months to
adopt the child goes over the 15 months. Unless there are other changes to the
system and not just an increase in cost this should not go forward.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Billie M. Cornell
